alert.note: Alert for Charlotte; Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 8:14PM EST until January 12 at 11:48PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Roanoke River At Roanoke affecting Roanoke, City of Salem and City of Roanoke independent cities. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia... Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and Halifax Counties. For the Roanoke River...including Roanoke, Brookneal, Randolph... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to late Friday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 19.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 27.6 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 815 AM EST.
